description: This is a React component file for a Note Organizer frontend application, including data fetching functions, components for listing, editing, and managing notes, and the main page component.

methods.name: classNames
methods.description: Utility function to combine CSS class strings conditionally

methods.name: fetchNotes
methods.description: Fetches all notes from the backend API

methods.name: fetchNote
methods.description: Fetches a single note by ID from the backend API

methods.name: createNote
methods.description: Creates a new note via the backend API

methods.name: updateNote
methods.description: Updates an existing note via the backend API

methods.name: deleteNote
methods.description: Deletes a note by ID via the backend API
